home.title: Decentralized Digital Family Tree
home.subtitle: Zero-knowledge privacy protection ¬∑ Salted passphrase unlinkability ¬∑ Dual tree models ¬∑ Community endorsement ¬∑ NFT value creation

coreValue.title: Core Mission
coreValue.description: Building a permanently trusted global digital genealogy infrastructure

valueProps.title: Core Value Propositions
valueProps.subtitle: A trusted multi-dimensional genealogy layer turning open exploration into confirmed value.

zkPrivacy.title: Zero-Knowledge Privacy
zkPrivacy.description: Use Groth16 proofs to privately submit family members, verifying structural correctness while hiding sensitive information

saltedUnlinkability.title: Salted Passphrase Unlinkability
saltedUnlinkability.description: Unique passphrases prevent identity inference and pollution attacks, ensuring uniqueness and security of each identity hash

dualTreeModels.title: Dual Tree Models
dualTreeModels.description: Support both public collaborative trees and private protected trees, meeting different genealogy construction needs

communityEndorsement.title: Community Endorsement
communityEndorsement.description: DEEP token endorsement mechanism filters noise, forming community consensus on high-quality data

nftValueCreation.title: NFT Value Creation
nftValueCreation.description: Version ‚Üí NFT ‚Üí holders receive subsequent endorsement fee streams, incentivizing high-quality data contributions

storyShardingSealing.title: Story Sharding & Sealing
storyShardingSealing.description: Shard biographical content + hash verification + immutable after sealing, creating permanent on-chain archives

valueSystem.title: Two-Layer Value System
valueSystem.subtitle: Progressive privacy model: private submission ‚Üí community endorsement ‚Üí optional public disclosure

layer1.title: Privacy Protection
layer1.description: Salted passphrase system prevents identity inference and pollution attacks. Zero-knowledge proofs ensure complete privacy during submission.

layer2.title: Public NFT Assets
layer2.description: Community-endorsed versions can be minted as NFTs, revealing full personal information. Story sharding enables detailed on-chain biographies.

flow.title: Privacy to Value Flow
flow.description: From private hash storage to community-validated NFT assets
flow.step1Desc: Add family members with zero-knowledge proofs
flow.step2Desc: Mint NFTs revealing full biographical information

dualModels.title: Dual Family Tree Models
dualModels.description: Salted passphrase system enables both collaborative public trees and pollution-resistant private trees

public.title: Public Collaborative Trees
public.description: Shared passphrases enable multiple users to collaboratively build comprehensive family trees together.

private.title: Private Protected Trees
private.description: Unique passphrases create completely protected trees immune to pollution attacks and relationship corruption.

advantages.title: Workflow
advantages.subtitle: Five-step value discovery and consensus formation mechanism
advantages.step1Desc: If both parents exist ‚Üí receive mining rewards
advantages.step2Desc: Pay DEEP tokens to endorse a version
advantages.step3Desc: Endorsers can mint NFTs for corresponding versions
advantages.step4Desc: NFT holders write/append person story fragments
advantages.step5Desc: Seal stories to form immutable on-chain historical records
advantages.conclusionDesc: Through economic incentive mechanisms, achieving natural accumulation and value discovery of high-quality genealogy data

privacyLayer.title: Privacy Protection Layer
privacyLayer.description: Privacy protection mechanism based on zero-knowledge proofs, ensuring security of sensitive information

valueLayer.title: Value Confirmation Layer
valueLayer.description: Achieving data value confirmation and distribution through economic incentives and consensus mechanisms

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Advanced blockchain infrastructure enabling privacy-first family tree construction with community validation

zkVersion.title: Zero-Knowledge Privacy Protection
zkVersion.description: Build family trees privately using Groth16 proofs - verify relationships exist without revealing personal information. Salted passphrases prevent identity inference and pollution attacks.

versionManagement.title: Multi-Version Data Management
versionManagement.description: Support multiple versions of each person with complete traceability. Immutable history with endorsement-based priority filtering ensures data integrity and community consensus.

endorsementEconomy.title: Smart Economic Incentives
endorsementEconomy.description: DEEP token endorsement system with progressive halving rewards. Pay mining rewards to endorse quality data, creating sustainable economic cycles that reward complete family connections.

personNFT.title: Value-Creating NFT Assets
personNFT.description: Transform endorsed person versions into valuable NFTs with ongoing revenue streams. NFT holders receive future endorsement fees, creating long-term value for quality contributions.

storySharding.title: Biographical Story Preservation
storySharding.description: Store detailed life stories in 100√ó1KB on-chain chunks with hash verification. Immutable sealing creates permanent historical archives with complete biographical content.

versionNotarization.title: Dual Tree Architecture
versionNotarization.description: Enable both public collaborative trees (shared passphrases) and private protected trees (unique passphrases) for flexible genealogy construction with anti-pollution guarantees.

tokenomics.title: Incentives & Token Economics
tokenomics.subtitle: DEEP token-driven sustainable ecosystem incentive mechanism

deepToken.title: DEEP Token
deepToken.description: Multi-stage declining mining ‚Üí entering stable issuance intervals, anti-inflation design

supply.title: Supply Cap
supply.description: 100 billion token cap, no pre-mining, fair launch

mining.title: Mining Trigger
mining.description: Triggered when adding valid person versions with parent references

endorsement.title: Endorsement Fees
endorsement.description: Equal to current mining rewards, adaptively coupled with issuance intensity

distribution.title: Fee Distribution
distribution.description: Before NFT minting ‚Üí creators; after NFT minting ‚Üí NFT holders

goal.title: Economic Goals
goal.description: Encourage high-quality structured completion, suppress spam and repetitive noise

audience.title: Target Audiences
audience.subtitle: A collaborative ecosystem of diverse user groups

contributors.title: Data Contributors
contributors.description: Input, complete and verify genealogy information, building trusted family tree data networks

researchers.title: Family Researchers
researchers.description: Track version evolution and divergences, explore multi-dimensional narratives and truths of family history
researchers.benefit2: Discover hidden connections in family relationship networks

developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Integrate smart contracts, frontend components, develop secondary applications and knowledge graph systems

creators.title: Narrative Creators
creators.description: Write and preserve historical stories, transforming family memories into verifiable on-chain archives
creators.benefit2: Obtain copyright protection through story sharding

contracts.title: Smart Contract Architecture
contracts.subtitle: A complete family tree smart contract system covering person management, endorsement systems, NFT minting, and governance mechanisms

cta.title: Start Building Your Digital Family Tree
cta.subtitle: Build your digital family tree using smart contracts and search in constructing a decentralized family history recording system

hashCalculator.title: Calculate personHash Locally
hashCalculator.tip: üí° Tip: Use the tool below to calculate person hash, then copy it to use in the queries below
hashCalculator.name: Full Name
hashCalculator.passphrasePlaceholder: Optional: Enter passphrase for enhanced privacy

passphraseHelp.title: Passphrase Usage Guide
passphraseHelp.privacyDesc: Adds an extra protection layer to your identity hash, preventing others from guessing your identity through name and birth date.
passphraseHelp.optionalDesc: Can be left empty, but using a strong passphrase is recommended for better security.
passphraseHelp.rememberDesc: Passphrase cannot be recovered. If forgotten, a different identity hash will be generated.

passwordTips.weak: üí° Tip: Use 8+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers or special characters

hashCalculator.description: Note: Calculation logic is completely consistent with the contract getPersonHash.

validation.nameTooLong: Name cannot exceed 256 bytes (approximately 256 English characters)

validation.tokenIdRequired: Please enter a valid Token ID
validation.versionIndexRequired: Please enter a valid version index (‚â•0)
validation.yearExceedsCurrent: AD year cannot exceed current year

ui.traversalDesc: DFS depth-first (faster deep nodes) / BFS breadth-first (level-wise)
ui.includeVersionDetailsDesc: Affects whether version detail batches are loaded on the next refresh (snapshot taken at refresh).

people.title: Family People Encyclopedia
people.subtitle: Explore family member profiles preserved on the blockchain
people.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, location, or biography content...

actions.title: Blockchain Actions
actions.subtitle: Interact with the DeepFamily protocol using your connected wallet
actions.walletRequiredDesc: Connect your wallet to access blockchain features like adding versions, minting NFTs, and endorsing.
actions.whatYouCanDo: What you can do after connecting:
actions.feature1: Add new person versions (earn DEEP tokens)
actions.feature2: Mint person versions as NFT collectibles
actions.addVersionDesc: Add a new version of person data with zero-knowledge proofs
actions.mintNFTDesc: Convert endorsed person data into valuable NFT collectibles
actions.endorseDesc: Support quality data by endorsing versions with DEEP tokens
actions.mintNFTHint: First search for a person and version to mint as NFT
actions.endorseHint: Search for person versions to endorse

addVersion.generatingProof: Generating zero-knowledge proof... (this may take 30-60 seconds)
addVersion.zkProofVerifiedDesc: Zero-knowledge proof was successfully verified on-chain
addVersion.versionAddedDesc: Person version was successfully added to the family tree
addVersion.familyComplete: Complete family data bonus - both parents exist in the system
addVersion.tokenRewardCondition: Token rewards are only distributed when both parents already exist in the system
addVersion.tokenRewardTip: Add the parents first to earn DEEP token rewards for complete family data
addVersion.proofGenerationNote: ZK proof generation requires complex cryptographic calculations. Please wait...
addVersion.personInfoHint: Plain text stays off-chain; used only for local ZK proof

mintNFT.title: Mint NFT
mintNFT.description: Create a unique NFT for this person
mintNFT.headerOnChainHint: Minting is public: plain text will be permanently on-chain
mintNFT.specifyVersionDesc: Enter the person hash and version index of the version you want to mint as NFT.
mintNFT.storyPlaceholder: Enter a brief life story summary...
mintNFT.tokenURIHint: Optional: URL or IPFS hash for NFT metadata
mintNFT.nftAlreadyMintedDesc: This version has already been minted as an NFT. Each version can only be minted once.
mintNFT.endorsementRequiredDesc: You must endorse this version before minting. Would you like to go endorse now?
mintNFT.mintingDesc: Creating your unique NFT on the blockchain...
mintNFT.proofGenerationNote: ZK proof generation requires heavy cryptography. Please keep this tab active until completion.
mintNFT.nftMintedEventDesc: NFT was successfully minted and recorded on-chain

validation.yearExceedsCurrent: AD year cannot exceed current year

errors.versionAlreadyMinted: This version has already been minted as NFT
errors.mustEndorseFirst: You must endorse this version before minting
errors.basicInfoMismatch: Person information does not match the version data

mintNFT.missingBothParents: Both parent hashes are empty for this version. The version creator may supplement parent information in the future.
mintNFT.missingFather: The father hash is empty for this version. The version creator may supplement father information in the future.
mintNFT.missingMother: The mother hash is empty for this version. The version creator may supplement mother information in the future.
mintNFT.parentUpdateNote: Note: Only the original version creator can supplement parent information via the updatePersonParents function.

endorse.benefitPriority: Endorsed versions get higher priority in searches
endorse.benefitEconomy: Support version creators and NFT holders

endorse.approveUnlimited: Approve unlimited DEEP allowance to avoid future approvals
